section.title: qsc_socket_server_async_accept_state Struct Reference

para.para: The async listener-accept state structure. The structure contains a pointer to the listener socket, and pointers to a callback and error functions. The callback function returns a populated qsc_socket_server_accept_result structure. The error function returns the listener socket and an qsc_socket_exceptions error code.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: The async listener-accept state structure. The structure contains a pointer to the listener socket, and pointers to a callback and error functions. The callback function returns a populated qsc_socket_server_accept_result structure. The error function returns the listener socket and an qsc_socket_exceptions error code.
